title: U.S Open Crowns a New Champion
itunes:title: U.S Open Crowns a New Champion
description:
Hosts Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Damian Sassower are joined by Bloomberg News Senior reporter Gillian Tan on an upcoming wrap of who on Wall Street attended the US Open plus reactions to the championship matches. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
